author: Odeinoichus
title: Batman loving Tech
review:
Set #71019 GPL Tech: Here comes one of Garmadon's Research & Development team in the LEGO Ninjago Movie CMF Series and this particular character features one of the greatest looking torso details of all time.

GPL Tech features huge glasses on her face with very large eyes behind them, her legs are dual-molded to better represent the long trailing labcoat she's wearing. What's fun about this Minifigure is the Batman Logo T-Shirt she's wearing underneath her labcoat. This means she must be a huge fan of LEGO Batman. Her accessories are the typical red coffee mug and the less typical labtop element.

Overall, this figure looks great. She's unfortunately a bit of a generic looking figure, but that too can be a good thing considering the multiple uses these parts can have for MOC figs. Definitely recommend this figure.
